context: Tests whether the agent follows the blog-writer skill's structural, formatting, and voice rules when producing a complete blog post draft from a video transcript with persona and series context provided.

checklist.name: Research bank created
checklist.description: A file named blog-research-agent-disasters-ep3.md exists in the working directory

checklist.name: Research bank structure
checklist.description: The research bank file contains sections for Source Material Summary, Clarification Log (or equivalent gap identification), and Editorial Plan

checklist.name: Draft file naming
checklist.description: A file named blog-draft-agent-disasters-ep3.md exists in the working directory

checklist.name: TLDR is bullets not prose
checklist.description: The draft contains a TLDR section that uses bullet points (lines starting with - or *), NOT prose paragraphs

checklist.name: TLDR bullet count
checklist.description: The TLDR contains exactly 2, 3, or 4 bullet items (not 1, not 5+)

checklist.name: TLDR placed before body
checklist.description: The TLDR section appears before the opening hook/story, not at the end of the post

checklist.name: Opening is narrative
checklist.description: The first section after TLDR opens with a story, anecdote, or confession -- NOT a thesis statement and NOT a preamble like 'In this post we will explore'

checklist.name: Placeholder independent numbering
checklist.description: Screenshot placeholders and Code placeholders each start their own numbering at 01 independently (e.g., Screenshot 01 and Code 01 can both exist, NOT Screenshot 01 then Code 02)

checklist.name: Placeholder zero-padding
checklist.description: All placeholders use zero-padded numbers (01, 02, etc.) not bare single digits (1, 2, etc.)

checklist.name: Author bio present
checklist.description: The draft ends with an author bio section for Marcus Chen that follows the schema from persona/bio.md

checklist.name: Bio kicker is post-specific
checklist.description: The author bio includes a rotating kicker (final sentence) that references something specific from THIS post (recipes, the agent calling OpenAI, chocolate spaghetti, etc.)

checklist.name: Series callback present
checklist.description: The draft references at least one element from previous episodes (e.g., 'it's probably a quick fix' from Episode 2, or 'the authentication incident' from Episode 1)

checklist.name: No preamble announcement
checklist.description: The draft does NOT contain phrases like 'In this post, we'll explore', 'Let's take a look at', or 'What follows is'
